verbose_text: The results showed that treatment of the mice with PID with an oral preparation of xiaoyuningkun decoction significantly reduced inflammation in the mouse uterus and Fallopian tube and also had an analgesic effect by improving the pain threshold when compared with the non treated controls and with Cynanchum paniculatum and fukeqianjin alone.
evidence: PID with an oral preparation of xiaoyuningkun decoction significantly reduced inflammation
